attributes.action: mutual exchange of U.K. & Spanish Driving licenses
attributes.additional_details: We can not get to the towns ,doctors, banks ,solicitors etc, etc,, we are legally not permitted to drive. We are unable to exist.
attributes.background: Make it possible to use U.K. driving licence in Spain and vice versa

rejection.details: Decisions on what licences can be used in Spain are a matter for the Spanish Government. You could open a petition asking the Government to work with the Spanish Government to enable UK licence holders to use their licence in Spain.
